name: Cake Dash Cake
description:
In the 2022 New Year celebrations, I wish you all the very best, despite the difficult times. But we still care about making good games for everyone because we care about everyone's feelings. I want everyone to go through the exhaustion times. and start fresh in 2022 together.

Just a click, the same colored cake cubes will disappear. Unless the cake was overlaid with another piece of cake. If the cake you choose is too small (less than 4), it will be stored on the stack (with 5 squares) and we can drag it back and place it in a good position.
